page.title: 13POPULAR ENTERTAINMENT 1985
page.content: We made a survey in the{Pebsham}area of our block. This is a{mixed private {and council housing area in east town. On{T.V., films}were the most popular item.{Terry Wogan}was the most popular personality.{"Tom and Jerry"}were still the most favoured cartoon characters.{Roland Rat}was the best liked puppet character. Many people liked{tennis and {swimming}but thought that{football}was becoming too rowdy to watch live. The most popular radio station was{Radio {Caroline,}which has pop music all the time.{Cliff Richard}was still a popular singer.{Guitars}were played by a large number of people locally. {Pebsham Community Centre}was well used for clubs such as the Pebsham Evettes and Nautical Training Corps. A {library}is there and also a{bar}for adults to visit in the evenings.
